Item.sqlserver_body:
CREATE FUNCTION mpp_getPartAlternateSubstitute ( @part_ids VARCHAR(MAX), @source_part_id VARCHAR(32), @identity_list VARCHAR(MAX), @ip_address VARCHAR(32), @cur_user_id CHAR(32), @environment_attributes_xml NVARCHAR(MAX) ) RETURNS TABLE AS RETURN ( SELECT DISTINCT Alternates.source_id source_part, Part.id id, Part./*mpp_configurable:item_number_p_name*/item_number/*mpp_configurable*/ item_number, 'alternate' relative_type FROM [innovator]./*mpp_configurable:part_alternate_it_name*/Part_Alternate/*mpp_configurable*/ Alternates INNER JOIN [secured]./*mpp_configurable:part_it_name*/Part/*mpp_configurable*/('can_get', @identity_list, @ip_address, @cur_user_id, '', @environment_attributes_xml) Part ON Part.id = Alternates.related_id WHERE Alternates.source_id IN ( SELECT id FROM innovator.GenerateTableOfIds(@part_ids) )
UNION ALL
SELECT DISTINCT Bom.related_id source_part, Part.id id, Part./*mpp_configurable:item_number_p_name*/item_number/*mpp_configurable*/ item_number, 'substitute' relative_type FROM [innovator]./*mpp_configurable:bom_substitute_it_name*/BOM_Substitute/*mpp_configurable*/ Substitutes INNER JOIN [innovator]./*mpp_configurable:bom_it_name*/Part_BOM/*mpp_configurable*/ Bom ON Bom.id = Substitutes.source_id INNER JOIN [secured]./*mpp_configurable:part_it_name*/Part/*mpp_configurable*/('can_get', @identity_list, @ip_address, @cur_user_id, '', @environment_attributes_xml) Part ON Part.id = Substitutes.related_id WHERE Bom.source_id = @source_part_id AND Bom.related_id IN ( SELECT id FROM innovator.GenerateTableOfIds(@part_ids) ) )
Item.name: mpp_getPartAlternateSubstitute
